Name: Tombo Survivor
About the game: In a city of Polombia there have been many demonstrations due to injustices and abuses committed by the government and its Tombos. A government run by an evil pig that turns all good cops into despicable Tombos. These Tombos learn to abuse power, mistreating the people and getting away with it, turning more and more into despicable pigs. In the game you are going to play the role of a corrupt Tombo that abuses power, you must hit the citizens but be careful, the citizens are tired of police abuse and they will defend themselves and claim their rights; They will attack you by hitting and throwing empanadas. Don't let anyone escape! As the game progresses you will become more and more corrupt and you will be able to evolve and become an increasingly pig Tombo. When you collect enough points and you must face the evil Pig, it is located in the main square of the city. Do not forget to collect bribes and other objects that appear on the map to recover your energy, you can also perform missions to increase your score faster.
